name: Toxic Mania
description:
Game created for the MFGM Summer 2022.

Toxic Mania is a 2D roguelike top down shooter survival game.

You are located at the verge of the end of the world, where toxic gas is corroding everything that it touches and degrading your health little by little. Fortunately, health points have been placed for you in strategic locations for your benefit. 

Escape while you still can and kill all the mutant/robotic enemies that stand in your way. Tip: Upgrade your stats with the coins that you collect, so you gain a better chance to survive.

How to play:

  • Move: WASD keys.
  • Dash: Space bar.
  • Pause: Esc key.
  • Suicide: X lol

Install instructions: 

The game was made with Unity. Download and open the application.
